eu_initiatives: Renewable energy directive, energy efficiency directive, energy performance of buildings directive
organisation_name: Malta Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energies Association (M.E.E.R.E.A.)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
- promote discussion on energy  
related issues among energy  
actors including consumers and  
energy decision makers in Malta. 
 
- support the organisation of  
training courses for energy actors  
and energy decision makers in  
Malta. 
 
- promote the implementation of  
dissemination (marketing,  
promotion) activities. 
 
- promote sustainable energy  
policies that emphasize energy  
efficiency and use of renewable  
energies in Malta. 
 
- facilitate information exchange  
among energy related actors. 
 
- Strengthen the cooperation  
between Maltese energy actors and  
those in the Mediterranean  
countries and EU member states.
relevant_communication: Local Seminars, Memberships in a number of Associations including International Network for Sustainable Energy, Europe (INFORSE-Europe), World Wind Energy Association (WWEA) and World Council of Renewable Energy (WCRE).
